media:group.media:title: Debate rages over white house roofs amid Thames Coromandel ban
media:group.media:description: A white roof makes a house more energy efficient but in many coastal communities, the colour is banned because it stands out so glaringly from the natural environment.

media:group.media:title: MEET THE MULLERS
media:group.media:description:
Todd Muller came out of nowhere, rolling Simon Bridges to become National’s new hope for the September election.
It’s been rocky start, but Muller is finally finding his feet – and staging a comeback in the polls.
Sunday goes home to Tauranga to meet the Muller family and to quiz the wannabe PM about Catholicism, contraception and cannabis.

media:group.media:title: JUSTICE FOR SCOTTY
media:group.media:description: For a decade, Kylee Guy has lived in the shadow of her husband’s brutal murder. Scott Guy, a young farmer, was shot dead in his Feilding driveway in 2010. The killer is still at large. Kylee has shielded her children from the intense media scrutiny around the case. But this week, in an exclusive interview, she pays tribute to the man she loved - and explains why she’s determined to find his killer.
